messages.message:
:yellow_circle: :blob-turtle: Hi there!

We need to do a purge of docker remote cache objects in S3 this afternoon, as we're running into some odd buildx behavior when retrieving / writing cache manifests.

This will not break anything, _but_ *it will cause service image builds to be slow for a little bit.* Rehydrating the cache is not always super quick, but it is generally stable.

That said, if you have any service builds that are just barely squeaking by under existing timeouts, the slow-down may cause a timeout or two. If that happens, let us know in <#C035SLYCJ9X|> and we can look at manual overrides to help out. :slightly_smiling_face:
:dog_running: Heads-up that I'm kicking off the deletion now. :+1:
